name: Landlord Simulator
description: Be your own landlord in the town of New Blossom. Buy and fix homes & apartments, fix issues that arise, run businesses and play mini-games. It's all up to you which order you do it in. Just remember to own the town and run it in the way you see fit in the end.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: Intel® Celeron® Processor J1800 or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD graphics or better Storage: 425 MB available space
